summary: Two eccentric scientists struggle to create eternal youth in a world they call "blind to the tragedy of old age." As they battle their own aging and suffer the losses of loved ones, their scientific journeys ultimately become personal.
cast: Aubrey de Grey|Bill Andrews|Ralph Andrews|William Bains|Cordelia de Grey|Randy Lee|Molly Sheridan|Adelaide Carpenter|Terry Grossman|Leonard Hayflick|John Anderson|Colin Blakemore|Kim
title: The Immortalists
